Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and is worth $15000 to us. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $14000. This represents a significant saving of $1000 compared to its original value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a high-quality product at an attractive price. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
